name: DailyHoroscope
0:
”Alexa, ask Daily Horoscope”
”Alexa, launch Daily Horoscope”
”Alexa, play Daily Horoscope”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily horoscope
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Daily Horoscope! If you are very passionate about learning your upcoming astrological forecast for the day or the foreseeable future, we are here to assist. We provide predictions that will help you prepare for any challenges ahead of you.

Daily Horoscope remembers your zodiac sign so that next time it directly takes you to your horoscope. You can always change your default zodiac sign by saying, "Alexa, change my default sign" while the skill is in session.

Daily Horoscope provides:

- The main horoscope offers general suggestions related to everyday life events.

- The travel horoscope deals with destinations and activities, advising how to keep travel plans!

Try out Daily Horoscope today and find the best way to eliminate uncertainty from your life. 

Daily Horoscope provides readings for all twelve zodiac signs:

♈ Aries horoscope
♉ Taurus horoscope
♊ Gemini horoscope
♋ Cancer horoscope
♌ Leo horoscope
♍ Virgo horoscope
♎ Libra horoscope
♏ Scorpio horoscope
♐ Sagittarius horoscope
♑ Capricorn horoscope
♒ Aquarius horoscope
♓ Pisces horoscope

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate Daily Horoscope to hear daily predictions. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

1. Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left corner
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap “When this happens” to choose the trigger. For example, you can select Voice and then type “Daily Horoscope”
5. Tap “Add action” and select “Skills”
6. Tap Your skills and find the “Daily Horoscope” skill in the list
7. Tap “Save” in the upper right corner to create your new routine!

To hear daily predictions, say, “Alexa, open Daily Horoscope”

MORE RELAXING SOUNDS ON ALEXA
 You can find more high-quality sleep and relaxing sounds by Ektara on Alexa.
 - Comfort My Dog
 - Spa Music
 - Calm My Cat
 - Big Meow
